service_description: The Data, Voice, NTTV Service provided through optical Fiber (FTTH) by Nepal Telecom has the following 4 Packages as per Internet/ Telephone/ NTTV subscription and price are set accordingly

1_multiyear_internet_only_pack.title: MULTI-YEAR NT FIBER (FTTH) Internet Only Pack

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps
100 Mbps
150 Mbps
200 Mbps

notes: No Installation Charge
CPE is FREE of Cost
100 m. fiber cable is FREE of Cost
Yearly 3000 min. NT-NT telephone voice call is included in the above packages
For New Telephone voice connection, an Ownership Tax of Rs. 665 along with standard voice rates apply
Warranty Period: 2 years

2_internet_telephone_package.title: NT Fiber Internet + Telephone Package

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps
75 Mbps
100 Mbps
150 Mbps
200 Mbps
50 Mbps for Existing Telephone Voice only subscribers (yearly)

notes: CPE cost is not included in the Monthly and Quarterly package
Monthly 250 min., Quarterly 750 min., and Yearly 3000 min. NT-NT Call is included in the above packages
One Time Installation Charge of Rs.500 & Ownership Tax of Rs.665 not included in the aforementioned price
FuP (Fair Usage Policy) is applicable daily

sections.title: NT Fiber with Basic NTTV Channels (Monthly & Quarterly)

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps + Basic NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
100 Mbps + Basic NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
150 Mbps + Basic NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
200 Mbps + Basic NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)

sections.title: NT Fiber with Premium NTTV Channels & Telephone Calls (Monthly & Quarterly)

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps + Premium NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
100 Mbps + Premium NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
150 Mbps + Premium NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)
200 Mbps + Premium NTTV Channels + 250 min./month Telephone calls (NT-NT)

sections.title: NT Fiber with Basic NTTV Channels & Telephone Calls(Yearly)

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
100 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
150 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
200 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls

sections.title: NT Fiber with Premium NTTV Channels & Telephone Calls (Yearly)

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
100 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
150 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
200 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls

sections.title: NT Fiber with Basic & Premium NTTV Channels & Telephone Calls (RENEWAL)

table_data.ftth_package: 50 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
100 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
150 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
200 Mbps Internet + Basic NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
50 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
100 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
150 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls
200 Mbps Internet + Premium NTTV Channels + 3000 min. NT-NT Telephone calls

general_notes: For new subscription of monthly & quarterly packages, CPE & STB to be purchased separately
One Time Installation Charge of Rs.500 & Ownership Tax of Rs.665 not included in the aforementioned price
For additional NTTV connection, STB charge of Rs.3230 per box and standard rate is applicable for basic & premium channels respectively
FuP (Fair Usage Policy) is applicable daily

fup_for_individual_package.note: Users subscribing to Premium FTTH Package, FTTH with IPTV Combo package, and Corporate package with bandwidth 100 Mbps - 1Gbps shall be provided with 1 (one) Public IP address without any extra cost if demanded by the customer.

Unlimited NT-NT, 500Min Off-Net Call, 1 TB per day: Throttling speed: 200 Mbps
